    • Leader [680pts]

      • Bloodsecrator [120pts]

        Selections: Ensorcelled Axe, Gorechosen - 5-8 GORECHOSEN units, Hand-carved Nullstone Icon

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, HERO, TOTEM, BLOODBOUND, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, BLADES OF KHORNE, GORECHOSEN, BLOODSECRATOR

        Special Rules: Hand-carved Nullstone Icon, Unit: Bloodsecrator, Unit Abilities: Icon of the Blood God, Rage of Khorne, Weapon: Ensorcelled Axe


        Special Rules Description Ref
        Hand-carved Nullstone Icon The bearer can attempt to unbind 1 spell or attempt to dispel 1 endless spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a Wizard. Each time the bearer successfully unbinds a spell or dispels an endless spell using this ability, the bearer can attempt to unbind 1 additional spell in that phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bloodsecrator 5"683+ Battletome: Blades of Khorne (2023) p107
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Icon of the Blood God If this unit issues the Rally command (core rules, 7.2) to a friendly BLOODBOUND unit with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or less, you can return 1 slain model to that unit for each 4+ instead of each 6.
        Rage of Khorne Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 friendly unit on the battlefield with this ability to plant its Icon of Khorne. If you do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units on the battlefield until the end of that phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ensorcelled Axe Melee1"43+3+-12

        Bloodstoker 5"584+ Battletome: Blades of Khorne (2023) p111
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Whipped to Fury At the start of your movement phase, you can pick up to D3 other friendly BLOODBOUND units within 3" of this unit and a roll a dice for each of those units. Regardless of the roll, that unit can run and still charge later in the turn, but on a roll of 1 it also suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Blood Whip Melee3"33+3+-1
        Torture Blade Melee1"33+3+-12

        Brass-clad Shield This unit has a ward of 5+ against mortal wounds caused by spells and mortal wounds caused by the abilities of endless spells.
        Lord of Brass Stampede Once per battle, at the start of the charge phase, you can say this unit will declare a Brass Stampede. If you do so, until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for this unit and friendly MIGHTY SKULLCRUSHER units wholly within 16" of this unit.
        Slaughterous Charge After this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

      • Realmgore Ritualist [110pts]

        Selections: Bless, Gorechosen - 5-8 GORECHOSEN units, Killer Instinct, Ritual Dagger, Smite

        Categories: 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, CHAOS, BLADES OF KHORNE, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, PRIEST, GORECHOSEN, REALMGORE RITUALIST

        Prayer: Bless, Bloodhex, Killer Instinct, Smite, Unit: Realmgore Ritualist, Unit Abilities: Desecrating Blood Runes, Weapon: Ritual Dagger


        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Bless 412"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 6+.
        Bloodhex 416"If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter. Until the start of your next hero phase, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristics of that unit's melee weapons (to a minimum of 1).
        Killer Instinct 316"If answered, pick 1 friendly BLADES OF KHORNE unit wholly within range, visible to the chanter and more than 3" from all enemy units. That unit can make a normal move.
        Smite 248"Pick 1 enemy Priest within range and visible to the chanter. That enemy Priest suffers 1 mortal wound. If the chanting roll was 6 or more, that enemy Priest suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Realmgore Ritualist 5"585+ Battletome: Blades of Khorne (2023) p104
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Desecrating Blood Runes Once per battle, at the end of your movement phase, you can pick 1 objective or terrain feature within 3" of this unit and say that it has been marked with desecrating blood runes. If you do so, until the end of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly BLOODBOUND units while they are wholly within 8" of that objective or terrain feature.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ritual Dagger Melee1"13+3+-2D6

        Selections: Brazen Anvil, Gorechosen - 5-8 GORECHOSEN units

        Skullgrinder 5"684+ Battletome: Blades of Khorne (2023) p108
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bone-crushing Strikes Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Brazen Anvil for attacks that target an enemy MONSTER. In addition, if any wounds caused by this unit's Brazen Anvil are allocated to an enemy MONSTER, the strike-last effect applies to the enemy MONSTER until the end of that phase.
        Tempered with Fury At the end of deployment, you can pick 1 other friendly BLOODBOUND HERO within 8" of this unit to have their weapon tempered. If you do so, pick 1 of that HERO's melee weapons. Improve the Rend characteristic of that weapon by 1 until the end of the battle. The same unit cannot be picked to have their weapon tempered more than once in the same battle.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Brazen Anvil Melee2"33+3+-13

        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Skullhunter. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Bloodglaive or Ensorcelled Axe.
        Murderous Charge After a model in this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit and roll a dice for each model in this unit that is within 3" of that enemy unit. For each 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.
        Musician 1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

        Daemonforged Weapons If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit's Daemonforged Weapons is 6, that attack causes 1 mortal wound to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Reap a Deadly Toll Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if the target unit has 5 or more models.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Blades of Khorne

          Selections: The Goretide

          Categories: Coalition: Beasts of Chaos, Coalition: Slaves to Darkness

          Battle Trait: Hatred of Sorcery, Legions of Chaos, Locus of Fury, Murderous to the Last, Summon Daemons of Khorne, The Blood Tithe, Tireless Conquerors, Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended: 1 - Murderlust, 2 - Spelleater Curse, 3 - Brass Skull Meteor, 4 - Apoplectic Frenzy, 5 - Rising Hatred, 6 - Heads Must Roll, 7 - Let the Blood Flow, 8 - Slaughter Triumphant, Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning: 01 - 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, 02 - 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, 03 - 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, 04 - Bloodletter Host with 20 models, 05 - Flesh Hounds unit with 10 models, 06 - Bloodletter Host with 10 models, 07 - Bloodcrushers unit with 3 models, 08 - 1 Skull Cannon, 09 - 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne, 10 - 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne, 11 - Flesh Hounds unit with 5 models, 12 - 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Hatred of Sorcery Each time a friendly BLADES OF KHORNE unit is affected by a spell cast by an enemy unit or the abilities of an endless spell summoned by an enemy unit, make a Hatred of Sorcery roll by rolling a dice. On a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless's abilities on that unit and you receive 1 Blood Tithe. Battletome: Blades of Khorne p72
        Legions of Chaos A Blades of Khorne army can include coalition units (see below) as follows:

        - 2 in every 4 units in the army can be a coalition unit from the Slaves to Darkness faction that has the MARK OF CHAOS or KHORNE keyword and does not have the WIZARD keyword. Those units gain the KHORNE keyword (if they do not already have it).

        - 1 in every 4 units in the army can be a coalition unit from the Beasts of Chaos faction that does not have the TZEENTCH, SLAANESH or WIZARD keywords. Those units gain the KHORNE keyword.        		 Battletome: Blades of Khorne p72
        Locus of Fury While a friendly BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON unit is more than 8" from all enemy units, it benefits from the Locus of Fury. Units have a ward of 5+ while they benefit from the Locus of Fury. If a friendly BLADES OF KHORNE DAEMON unit retreats, it does not benefit from the Locus of Fury for the rest of the battle. Battletome: Blades of Khorne p72
        Murderous to the Last Each time a friendly BLOODBOUND model is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of that model and make a murder roll by rolling a dice. On a 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the slain BLOODBOUND model was a HERO, make 3 murder rolls instead of 1. Battletome: Blades of Khorne p72
        Summon Daemons of Khorne You can summon units of KHORNE DAEMONS to the battlefield by expending Blood Tithe points. If you have 2 or more Blood Tithe points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one unit from the list below onto the battlefield, and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. Units summoned in this way must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly KHORNE HERO or SKULL ALTAR and more than 9" from any enemy units. Battletome: Blades of Khorne p74
        The Blood Tithe When commanding a Blades of Khorne army, you can earn Blood Tithe points (BP) and spend them to use the Blood Tithe abilities below and to summon units to the battlefield (pg 74).

        You begin the battle with 0 Blood Tithe points. Each time a unit is destroyed, you earn 1 Blood Tithe point.

        Once at the end of each hero phase, you can spend your Blood Tithe points on 1 of the Blood Tithe Reward abilities from the list below. Each ability costs the number of Blood Tithe points shown next to its entry, and you can only spend Blood Tithe points to do so.

        'Rising Hatred' and 'Slaughter Triumphant' can be picked multiple times in the same battle, and they are cumulative.        		 Battletome: Blades of Khorne p73
        Tireless Conquerors Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly GORETIDE BLOODBOUND units that target an enemy unit that is contesting an objective you do not control, or that target an enemy unit wholly within enemy territory.
        Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended Reward Ref
        1 - Murderlust Pick 1 friendly BLADES OF KHORNE unit that is more than 3" from all enemy units. That unit can make a D6" move, and it can finish that move within 3" of any enemy units. You can spend Blood Tithe points on this Reward up to 3 times at the end of each hero phase instead of only once, but you cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this ability more than once per phase.
        2 - Spelleater Curse You can spend Blood Tithe points on this Reward in your opponent's hero phase immediately after an enemy WIZARD has cast a spell but before an unbinding attempt is made. That spell is automatically unbound (do not make an unbinding roll). If you spend Blood Tithe points on this Reward, you cannot spend any Blood Tithe points at the end of the same hero phase.
        3 - Brass Skull Meteor Pick 1 enemy unit on the battlefield and roll 8 dice. For each 5+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. Add 2 to each roll if the enemy has a Wounds characteristic of 10 or more or has 10 or more models.
        4 - Apoplectic Frenzy Pick 1 friendly BLADES OF KHORNE unit within 3" of an enemy unit. That BLADES OF KHORNE unit can fight.
        5 - Rising Hatred Add 1 to the Hatred of Sorcery rolls until the end of the battle.
        6 - Heads Must Roll Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units by 1 until the end of the turn.
        7 - Let the Blood Flow Roll 1 dice for each enemy unit on the battlefield that is within 3" of any friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        8 - Slaughter Triumphant Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units until the end of the battle.
        Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning Cost Ref
        01 - 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster 10
        02 - 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage 10
        03 - 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury 10
        04 - Bloodletter Host with 20 models 8
        05 - Flesh Hounds unit with 10 models 6
        06 - Bloodletter Host with 10 models 5
        07 - Bloodcrushers unit with 3 models 5
        08 - 1 Skull Cannon 5
        09 - 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne 5
        10 - 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne 4
        11 - Flesh Hounds unit with 5 models 3
        12 - 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne 3

    • Game Options

      • Battle Tactics (GHB2023-24)

        Categories: Game Options

        Battle Tactic: Bait and Trap, Endless Expropriation, Intimidate the Invaders, Led into the Maelstrom, Magical Dominance, Magical Mayhem, Reprisal, Surround and Destroy


        Battle Tactic Description Ref
        Bait and Trap You complete this battle tactic if 2 or more friendly units retreated this turn and 2 or more different friendly units made a charge move this turn.
        Endless Expropriation Pick 1 enemy unit that is controlling or bonded to an endless spell or INCARNATE. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if either of the following are true:
        That enemy unit has been destroyed.
        That INCARNATE is wild.
        Intimidate the Invaders You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if there are more friendly units wholly outside your territory than there are friendly units within your territory.
        Led into the Maelstrom You complete this battle tactic if all of the following are true:
        - At least 2 friendly units charged this turn.
        - At least 1 friendly Battleline unit charged this turn.
        - At least 1 friendly HERO charged this turn.
        - At least 1 friendly Battleline or HERO unit that charged this turn is
        within 3" of an enemy unit at the end of the turn.’
        Magical Dominance You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if a friendly Wizard unit successfully cast 1 or more spells and none of the spells cast by any units in your army were unbound.
        Magical Mayhem Pick 1 enemy unit on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed by a spell or the abilities of an endless spell.
        Reprisal You complete this battle tactic if an enemy unit that destroyed a friendly general earlier in the battle is destroyed in this turn.
        Surround and Destroy Pick 3 different friendly units on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic at the end of your turn if each of those units is wholly within 6" of a different battlefield edge and 2 or more of those units are wholly outside your territory.

      • Battle Tactics: For the Skull Throne

        Categories: Game Options

        Battle Tactic: Blood for the Altar, Leave None Standing, No Cowards Among Us, Slay the Sorcerer, The Battlefield Runs Red, The Trial of Skulls


        Battle Tactic Description Ref
        Blood for the Altar Pick 1 enemy unit within 8" of your Skull Altar. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. White Dwarf 474
        Leave None Standing Pick 1 friendly unit within 3" of any enemy units. You complete this battle tactic if that unit fights in the combat phase of this turn and at the end of that phase there are no enemy units within 3" of that unit.
        No Cowards Among Us You complete this battle tactic at the end of this turn if all friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units on the battlefield are within 8" of any enemy units.
        Slay the Sorcerer Pick 1 enemy WIZARD HERO on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that HERO is slain during this turn. White Dwarf 474
        The Battlefield Runs Red You complete this battle tactic if 4 or more units were destroyed during this turn.
        The Trial of Skulls Pick 1 friendly unit. You complete this battle tactic if 8 or more enemy models are slain by attacks made by that unit during this turn. White Dwarf 474

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Bring Me a Worthy Skull

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Bring Me a Worthy Skull


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Bring Me a Worthy Skull At the start of the first battle round, ask your opponent to pick 1 HERO from their army to be a worthy foe. When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if that HERO has been slain and the model picked to be your general has not been slain.

    • Malign Sorcery [50pts]

      • Judgement: Hexgorger Skulls [50pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Prayer: Summon Hexgorger Skulls, Unit Abilities: Compelled by Hate, Fly, Hexgorgers


        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Summon Hexgorger Skulls 38"If answered, set up the parts of the invocation wholly within range and visible to the chanter, within 8" of each other and more than 1" from all models, other invocations and endless spells. Only BLADES OF KHORNE PRIESTS can attempt to summon this invocation.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Compelled by Hate After this invocation is set up and at the start of each of their hero phases, the commanding player can move the parts of this invocation as if they were models with a Move characteristic of 8" and that can fly. After the parts have been moved, they must be within 8" of each other.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hexgorgers Subtract 2 from casting rolls for WIZARDS that are within 8" of any Hexgorger Skulls. In addition, if a WIZARD within 8" of this invocation attempts to cast a spell and the unmodified casting roll is 8, then that casting attempt is not successful, that WIZARD no longer knows that spell, each WIZARD within 8" of this invocation suffers D6 mortal wounds, and then this invocation is removed from play.
